entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer to detect if method called twice #92018
  • Convert.ToBase64CharArray throws IndexOutOfRangeException when encoding a zero-length slice of a non-empty source array into the zero-length slice at the end of a destination array #92016
  • Why Use `If - If` instead of `If - Else If` or `switch-case` #92015
  • Build crashes in System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationGuard #92007
  • Incorrect port from Socket.ReceiveFromAsync(SocketAsyncEventArgs) #92006
    8.0.0
  • Interportability between Diagnostics.TraceLevel and Diagnostics.SourceLevels #92004
  • [mono] Android x64: No pending exception expected: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException #92000
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 RC1 fails to NativeAOT compile when targeting ios-arm64 #91997
    9.0.0
  • Support of partition scoped and partition singleton service registration in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #92012
  • Possible finalizer thread stuck on System.RuntimeMethodHandle.Destroy #91995
  • Error in `ImmutableArray` initialization using C#12 collection literals #92022
    8.0.0
  • The system cannot open the device or file specified 'NuGet-Migrations' #91987
  • Network Traffic Statistics on Linux #91982
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl can't set ACLs on files with long paths #91980
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: InitialCapacity for CborWriter #91978
    9.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitForLoopsOn_R2r/BasicTest_QuickJitForLoopsOn_R2r.sh #91977
    9.0.0
  • Test failure profiler/gc/nongcheap/nongcheap.sh #91976
  • An error occurred trying to start process 'llvm-symbolizer' #91975
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Port System.Text.Json documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88577
    8.0.0
  • Performance of System.Formats.Cbor #91969
    Future
  • System.String.EndsWith() behaviour has changed when passing "\0" as an argument #92025
  • [NativeAOT] Thunk mapping doesn't work on macOS/x64 with hardened runtime #91738
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: architecture definitions for RISC-V ISA #73437
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 8/11/2023 7:34:28 PM #91941
  • Configuration binder source generator producing invalid code #92021
  • Ldap GetMembers working over 389 port #65894
    Future
  • [Extensions.Options] ValidateDataAnnotation doesn't work when classes have properties that also have DataAnnotations on their members #36093
    Future
  • Failure in System.Tests.Types.TypePropertyTestBase.Attributes_Get_ReturnsExpected #92014
  • [Azure Dev Ops][armel] Enable armel/Tizen jobs in Azure Dev Ops #11625
    Future
  • StackOverflowException when using Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #62239
    Future
  • EventPipe logs unintended events during rundown #90575
    8.0.0
  • Unsafe.AsRef in .NET 8 RC-1 #92008
  • .NET 8 RC1 can not compile with Windows app sdk and CsWinRT #91981
    8.0.0
  • Unexpected `QuicStream.WriteAsync` exception #82523
    9.0.0
  • `QuicStream.ReadsClosed` completes before EOS is consumed #79818
    9.0.0
  • Stream aborted if `QuicStream.WriteAsync` cancellation token is canceled after `WriteAsync` completes #82704
    9.0.0
  • `QuicStream.WritesClosed` continuation ran before the Quic reset frame is sent? #79911
    9.0.0
  • `QuicStream.ReadsClosed` doesn't always complete on connection disposal #77216
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #88765
    9.0.0
  • Managed type system casting logic doesn't handle all array variance #85146
    9.0.0
  • Cannot install `wasm-tools` workload since the latest `microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.net6` update #91932
  • Use Intrinsics.X86 for SpanHelpers.SequenceCompareTo(char) #12093
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `Array.Sort` overloads with `Comparison` delegate #91970
  • Fail to complete json serialization when using a mix of standard serializer and custom JsonConverter #90212
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove code that is only applicable to emitting mscorlib.dll for .NET Framework #92034
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #92033
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0-staging] Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #92032
    area-Host
  • Update FixupPrecode and StubPrecode types for ARM #92030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix assert about maximum fragment split size #92027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: [experiment] Add an explicit IR representation for parameter definitions #92026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch `BundleExtractToSpecificPath` and `BundleAndRun` to using built test assets #92024
    test-enhancement, area-Single-File
  • Fix si.ibAllocated in FrozenObjectHeapManager #92023
    area-VM-coreclr
  • SPMI: Increase timeout for superpmi-asmdiffs-checked-release Helix work items #92020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Metrics Feature Switch #92019
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Skip duplicate --info output if it is known SDK output #92013
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Replace newline characters in NoWarn #92010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Replace http.error.reason with OTel standard error.type #91996
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Delete FEATURE_TRACELOGGING #91986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update `Marshal.QueryInterface()` argument modifier #91984
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • proof of concept #91979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Revert "Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types (#91660)" #91989
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Try to disable VSIX update service or failfast #92028
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Switch macOS to mmap thunks like iOS platforms #91751
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Setup internal feeds in internal builds #90637
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types (#91660)" #91988
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • Remove public provider from rundown session #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Skip duplicate --info output if it is known SDK output #91900
    area-Host
  • SPMI: Hacky workaround for coredistools unsupported instructions #91668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename Options Validator Source Generator #91964
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Update `Marshal.QueryInterface()` argument modifier #91983
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add Performance Improvements in .NET 8 to deep-dive-posts.md #92003
    area-Meta
  • [mono][jit] Paired stores and loads are now used for vtypes in regs on arm64 #91925
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo in pr-guide.md #91991
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize Vector128.Create if there are some zero elements #91924
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Replace http.error.reason with OTel standard error.type #91910
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • Fix typo in features.md #91990
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix handling of variant casting in the managed type system #91788
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove CMake version checks #91632
    area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #91951
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #91949
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • invalid assert for segments #91491
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix binder gen compile issues due to inaccessible members and identifier name clashes #91967
    NO-REVIEW, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Minimize net diff of binder-gen visibility/identifier-clash fix #91974
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Implement Linq CountBy method for IEnumerable and IQueryable #91507
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't shut down event pipe in DLLs on Windows #91715
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make src gen for property setters consistent with reflection #91899
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator
  • [release/8.0] Make Options source gen support Validation attributes having constructor with array parameters #91934
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Light up BitArray APIs with Vector512 code path #91903
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono] Try enabling full trimming by default when not using blazor #89110
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-System.Configuration
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES for 8.0 release #91933
    area-Setup
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Do not throw PNSE exception from NegotiateAuthentication constructor #91753
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] dumpwriterelf: increase buffer to fit a RHEL8 arm64 page. #91953
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #91956
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0] Remove implicit narrowing conversions from zlib #91962
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • [release/8.0] Added missing *Async overrides to TlsStream #91794
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Pass the small size accurately to emitIns_valid_imm_for_ldst_offset #91741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • enable AIA tests on Mariner #90199
    area-System.Security
  • Use `isinst` in `System.Data.Common.ObjectStorage:Set` #91945
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Start running test added in #89061 #91780
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Substitute constant into loop testing variable where possible #90622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add optimisation of incrementing SELECT at lowering on arm64. #91262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91917
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91916
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Delete .NET Native left overs #91960
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Stop generating catch funclets #2399
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Emit object nodes as structs not arrays to allow for unaligned relocs. #2401

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A temp file + 2 folders are left behind in %TEMP% after each dotnet build command #35353
  • .net TLS 1.2 enable Ed25519 in signature algorithms extension #35345
  • Specifying a framework for multi-targeted dependencies that include a .NET Framework target does not work. #35341

Closed

  • `dotnet --info` includes two RID values with .NET 8 #35237

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #35374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [8.0.1xx] Use MVC extensions from Razor transport #35371
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add escape hatch for PublishAot without RuntimeIdentifier. Fixes #33414. #35366
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add `.mono` to `.gitingore` #35343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2266526 #35352
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for Haiku #35231
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35275
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #35315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35368
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use MVC extensions from Razor transport #35273
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35339
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Add dependency on non shipping package and use it's version #35310
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35325
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #35324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix package version in Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #35309
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Containers] Validate that user applications will run on the selected base image #35246
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Container Build: Add OCI Archive Format writing #35204
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: implicit collections in spreads and foreach #7534

Merged

  • Collection expressions: include additional implicit conversions #7533
  • Fix (possible) typo in function-pointers.md #7521

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions: additional implicit conversions from builder return value are not included in semantic model #69938
  • Document C# extension: async function returning a non-awaitable type with a task builder #69937
  • Add integration tests for Tools → Options #69929
  • MSBuild and dotnet fails to build after .NET SDK 7.0.307 #69931

Closed

  • IDE0028 has changed between .NET 8 Preview 7 and RC1 #69940
  • ArraySegment<byte> in async method leaves Array null #69777
    17.8
  • NRE from spell checker while working in Roslyn #69919
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34113.56 #69933
  • Roslyn has introduced many source-built prebuilts #69847
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove diagnostic source name field #69939
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use no-op global assembly cache helper when running under .net core #69936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure tuple conversions involved into a tuple binary operator are properly lowered. #69934
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use vs-threading extensions where available #69932
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add Quick Info test for 'see cref' #69930
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary feeds #69928
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Relax remote host APIs so they can work on workspace-green nodes #69935
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69788
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Fix torn write of struct causing crash in symbol finder. #69927
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix folding range bug in C# extension #69817
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update LanguageServerHost to use NamedPipeServerStream #69918
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix escaping and wrapping in vscode hover #69893
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use .NET 8 crossgen2's opt-cross-module option #69924
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Resolve source-built prebuilts #69900
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update SBRP dependency #69901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [Hackathon experiment] Add ICopilotConfigService and CodeAnalysisSuggestionsCodeRefactoringProvider #69925
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix issue with stale cached data in LSP pull diagnostics #69864
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69942
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do source-generation only in our OOP process. #69917
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude BCL binaries in Roslyn ServiceHub vsix #69239
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Replace InterceptorsPreview with InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces=global #69848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Ensure Endfilter basic block is preserved even if technically unreachable. #69922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Lazily populate FileIdentifier fields #69882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Refactoring of synthesized types tracking across EnC generations #69782
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add OrchardCore test to OptProf config #69909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Document outline updates #69921
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change the code for the BindConverter class used on binding so that it's integrated with Dependency injection #50692
  • Built In Components In Blazor #50689
  • 404 for _blazor/initializer after updating to RC1 #50688
  • [FromKeyedServices("keyName")] Keyed services support in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection is not resolving dependency in constructor #50687
  • Auto mode can lead to running Server and WebAssembly in the page at the same time #50686
  • Starting a new Blazor Web App sln fails after the first run #50682
  • Blazor Web App --> NavigationManager doesn't navigate without `forceLoad` #50691
  • ASPNETCORE_CONTENTROOT / DOTNET_CONTENTROOT / --contentRoot being ignored when running under IIS #50693
  • rc1 tag cross build failed for ppc64le #50679
  • .NET 8 RC1 Blazor Web App: [RenderModeAuto] keeps using the Server implementation then switches to WASM #50677
  • Using of CancellationToken in RemoteJSDataStream #50676
    8.0
  • BindAsync Surrogate Method in Minimal APIs #50672

Closed

  • [linux-arm64] Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.Sockets crashes #50623
  • BLAZOR: Increase Debouce Time For Render #50494
  • Perf regression: single_query #50639
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50673
  • Authenticating with an opaque bearer token always gives 401 error in .NET 8.0 RC1 #50680
  • [Blazor] Disable enhanced navigation on a per-element basis #50290
    8.0-rc2
  • Unable to redirect from non-Blazor endpoint to different-origin URL during enhanced navigation #50384
    8.0-rc2
  • Re-evaluate enhanced nav to non-Blazor endpoints #50591
    8.0-rc2
  • AsyncEnumerable response not working as expected #50656
  • Blazor AddAdditionalAssemblies does not make endpoints available to new Router component #50683
    Backlog
  • Breaking change in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Server` #50681
  • New RC1 Blazor Web App template gives error #50674

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #50690
    area-networking
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking
  • Blazor Web project globally-interactive option #50684
    area-mvc
  • Dispose secret instances #50675
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Support injecting keyed services with `[Inject]` #50561
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #50624
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web #50582
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Make enhanced nav much more conservative, and better handle redirections #50551
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
  • Support resolving IFormFile in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor
  • Remove explicit UseRouting from templates #50372
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Dynamically toggle navigation interception #50564
    area-blazor
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • Rename internal UseAck to UseStatefulReconnect #50407
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix dropping messages on reconnect #50409
    area-signalr
  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Location Permission is always Denied after denying it once #17361
  • `ArgumentException` on OnPropertyChanged #17357
    .NET 8 GA
  • [WinUI] Top left corner of the TitleBar is currently unclickable when you update to WinAPPSDK 1.4 #17356
  • Triggers doesn't work on appearing #17355
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] VisualState does not return to `Normal` state when using an `AppThemeBinding` #17354
    .NET 8 GA
  • Apply bindings once for ItemTemplate #17349
  • [iOS] TitleView not working properly #17347
    .NET 8 GA
  • Not able to add a frame in grid via c# code. #17346
  • Button stops responding on clicks after switching Command by DataTrigger #17344
  • Dialog not aligned vertically center in .NET 7 #17341
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Error MSB4018: The "AOTCompile" task failed unexpectedly #17340
    .NET 8 GA
  • .NET 8 iOS Release build very slow #17339

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.2.7871] Landscape Mode Splash Screen issue in .NET 8 Preview 2 #14514
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Drag and Drop Request Full-Size Previews #17281
    .NET 8 GA
  • :NET MAUI displays a list wrong on IOS, when the app was shortly in the background #13916
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • .NET 8 RC1 cannot use Syncfusion controls - SfListView gives System.TypeLoadException #17265
    .NET 8 GA
  • Finalize templates for .NET 8 #13929
    .NET 8 GA
  • Clicked event don't fire inside of Shell.TitleView in IOS #11168
    Backlog
  • MAUI template does not generate XAML #17351
  • Run MAUI app on M1 Mac without Rosetta 2 #4476
    .NET 8 GA
  • RefreshView on Android at .net 8 preview 7 don't stop refreshing #17338
  • VisualDiagnostics.GetSourceInfo on Style object returns the wrong source location. #17222
    .NET 8 GA
  • MauiAsset are not be copied during the Unpackaged publish #17260
  • Can't compile after moving to RC1 #17337

PullRequests

Created

  • Wait for parent to get set before realizing titleview #17360
    .NET 8 GA
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Changing value of Shell.NavBarIsVisible should change visibility of toolbar (ShellToolbar) #17358
    partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Remove Previous TitleView from Toolbar #17353
    .NET 8 GA
  • Revert changes to setting context and add tests #17348
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #17345
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • Merge main into net8.0 #17350
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable requesting the full preview size on iOS drag shadow & iOS and Windows Samples #17282
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Removed references to GraphicsTester.Skia.Tizen from Maui-dev and Maui-vscode sln files. #17334
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Extract TFM string into a const #17336
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [X] do not register srcinfo for xaml-defined values #17230
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Copy Windows MauiAssets to the publish folder for Unpackaged #17329
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • [build] Remove LangVersion #17327
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Added integration test for maui blazor maccatalyst codesign verification. #17331
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/testing, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Mac Catalyst Controls Device Tests in CI #17229
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix iOS InputTransparent layouts and add several InputTransparent UI tests #17286
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 GA
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Bump the androidx group with 5 updates #17322
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • [ci] Add MSI transport nugets to sign verify #17335
    .NET 8 GA
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • [net8.0] Build the previous TFM for Essentials & Graphics #17042
    Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON: empty json collection is not correctly materialized, but rather returned as null #31731
  • SqliteException: SQLite Error 19: 'NOT NULL constraint failed' when value is generated on add or update. #31730
  • How to get the more info related to the thrown exception #31729
  • EF Core compiled model #31727
  • Unable to configure a nested complex type property #31726
  • Treat SQL Server Error Number 1222 as Transient (Lock request time out period exceeded) #31724
  • Regression in 8.0-rc.1 with primitive readonly lists #31722
  • Using `char` properties results in in exception from the compiled model #31720
  • Model Building: Reset precision for inherited model properties #31718
  • EFCore7 GetAsync Error Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'second') #31717

Closed

  • How to disable debug messages logged to the Debug console #31694
  • Primitive collection - projection with owned entity #31420
  • Support primitive collections in the compiled model #31489
    8.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Treat Sql Error Number 1222 as Transient #31725
  • [release/7.0] Trim the mapping store type base name (#30593) #31721
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31719
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Adjust some exception messages #31707
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31713
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31712
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31711
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Compiled model support for primitive collections #31709

Updated

  • Add support for DATA_COMPRESSION and SORT_IN_TEMPDB SQL Server index options #30831
    waiting-for-response
  • [SMALL] Fix to #30996 - Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #31714
  • WIP #31692
